镼字的基本解释

镼
jié
古同“??”，妇人半臂服（短衣无袖，或肩有袖至臂臑而止）。

镼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《字彙補》其物切］
同“1”。
短衣。

镼字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【長字部】　镼； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1329第29
【正字通】渠勿切，音屈。【後漢·光武紀】諸于繡镼。【註】字書無镼字，續漢書作䘿，音其物反。揚雄方言曰：襜褕，其短者，自關而西謂之䘪䘿。郭註，俗名䘿掖。據此卽是諸于上加繡䘿，如今之半臂也。【廣記】韓晉公見少年單練?。【酉陽雜俎】作镼。

镼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
镼字的起名意思

暂无。

镼
Basic explanation of words
镼
jié
Ancient Tong "??", women's half-arm dress (short sleeveless, or sleeves on the shoulders to the arms).
镼
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
[The material cut of "Zihuibu"]
Same as "1".
Short coat.
镼
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集上】【Long Word Department】　镼; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1329 29
【Zhengzitong】Don't cut it, the sound is notch. [Later Han·Guangwu Ji] Zhuyu embroiders. [Note] There are no 镼 characters in the word book, and the continuation of the Han book is used as 䘿, and the sound is reversed. Yangxiong's dialect said: "Yangxiu", the short one, is called "Xianxiu" from the Guan to the west. Guo Note, the common name is She Ye. According to this, 卽 is the embroiderer on the top, which is now half of the arm. [Guangji] Han Jingong sees the young single practice?. 【Youyang Miscellaneous Cu】makes 镼.
